text: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā evaṃ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī ti
edit: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā evaṃ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī ti

translations.transtext: In that way, monks, the seven factors of enlightenment was cultivated. In that way [they], having been practiced frequently, fulfill insight and liberation.
